page.title: 04 OUR SCHOOL
page.content: We have a set of apparatus in the infants playground and some hopscotches. We have a book shop that sells all kinds of things.Thats on a Tuesday. Each class swims every day for 30 minutes.The pool is heated but needs repairing.A committee has been set up to raise Â£2,500 for repairs. Nearly Â£700 has been raised by pupils from a sponsored swim,disco and other activities.We have 2 sports sheds where we keep all kinds of things in.We mostly use the pitch for rounders and for football.Today on Monday 8th July 1985 we have French- man in our school trying to inprove his English.His name is Pierre he is very nice.He played rounders with us. He had never played rounders before and he scored two rounders.We also have a computer in the bottom building.
